sentences.english: The goal is to be able to look at complex diseases like cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是能够诊断像癌症这样的疑难杂症。

sentences.english: Many factors caused the Bangladesh well intervention to become a protracted struggle.
sentences.chinese: 许多因素导致孟加拉国水井事件拖成了疑难杂症。

sentences.english: Prajna Paramita is magic medicine that cures all kinds of puzzling and incurable diseases!
sentences.chinese: 般若波罗蜜多，是良药，能医治一切的疑难杂症。

sentences.english: We still have a lot of intractable diseases.
sentences.chinese: 我们还有很多的疑难杂症。

sentences.english: Many factors caused the Bangladesh well intervention to become a protracted struggle.
sentences.chinese: 许多因素导致孟加拉国水井事件拖成了疑难杂症。

sentences.english: At our core we have focused on solving difficult problems.
sentences.chinese: 我们关注于解决疑难杂症。

definition: hard to understand/difficult to deal with/knotty/complicated
(of medicine) to use specifically for the treatment of
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
stubborn illness/disease that is difficult to treat
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
